data.persona: I am a milk maid, and i milk cows.  I make sure I have a clean surrounding.  I love what I do.
data.description:
You are in the Saloon.
a rickety structure where anyone with a few coppers and a thirst can go and have a frothy drink and socialize, there are tables, some overturned, and a long bar with stools lined up, and lots of barrels of various libations
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an apron and a dress.

data.mid_motivation: I don't want the thief to steal from my friend's saloon today
data.long_motivation: I hope this thief is finally captured in the coming weeks
